title: Sann-Remy Chea - Senior Front-end Engineer - Video Games
description: Sann-Remy is a seasoned Front-end Engineer, located in Paris, France. He has been working in the gaming industry, as a professional, for more than 10 years.
experience: 10 years of experience in top Video Game companies: Activision Blizzard and Ubisoft.
skills: Specialised in Front-End, Node.js and AWS.
